short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk URL Opener is a simple Chrome extension designed to streamline your workflow by opening multiple URLs at once.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk URL Opener is a simple and efficient Google Chrome extension designed to streamline your workflow by opening multiple URLs at once. With a user-friendly text box and a single "Open" button, you can easily enter all the URLs you need and open them simultaneously with just one click. Ideal for researchers, developers, and anyone who needs to handle multiple web pages quickly and effortlessly. Say goodbye to the tedious task of opening URLs one by one and boost your productivity with Bulk URL Opener.
